hiveArticle.title: SBD - Giveaway # 12
hiveArticle.body:
If you want to get steem dollar for free, upvote and resteem this post. You will not lose anything! Rather, you will earn curation reward as well.


https://steemitimages.com/DQmbuUj5cnUMi7BUjAVZCLajdsVUtKo2gLsAZif6uyNvJx8/4.png


To increase the reward pool, you can also resteem this post.


100% of SBD from this post will be sent to the voters after 7 days.


https://steemitimages.com/DQmbLiup6T8aA6kNYeWjtpzDew6a4WJy765P7FRqTeEpST4/DQmbLiup6T8aA6kNYeWjtpzDew6a4WJy765P7FRqTeEpST4.gif


Follow @sbd.giveaway for daily free Steem Dollars.
